an6.33:1.1: “Imam, bhikkhave, rattim annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho, bhikkhave, sa devata mam etadavoca:
an6.33:1.4: Satthugaravata, dhammagaravata, sanghagaravata, sikkhagaravata, hirigaravata, ottappagaravata—
an6.33:1.5: ime kho, bhante, cha dhamma bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti’ti.
an6.33:1.7: Idam vatva mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayiti.
